summary: Diff implements public username resolution for post authors and updates the public feed rendering to display resolved usernames with an 'Anonymous' fallback.

hallucinated_features.description: Public feed polling via automatic refetch every 10 seconds.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for periodic refreshing/polling behavior; it only requests correct username display and authorization behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Post card UI enhancements unrelated to author resolution (timestamp 'time ago' formatting, avatar initials, topic label/variant mapping).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on showing the author's username instead of 'Anonymous' and adjusting backend read permissions; these additional UI behaviors are not requested.
